statistics-data.description: The result data of IFIT statistics.

period-id.description: Index of the statistics collection period of IFIT flows.

packet-count.description: Number of packets transmitted within this period.

byte-count.description: Number of bytes transmitted within this period.

timestamp-second.description: Integer part of the number of seconds starting at 00:00:00 UTC on January 1, 1970.

timestamp-nanosecond.description: Decimal part of the number of seconds starting at 00:00:00 UTC on January 1, 1970.
